c. 
according to the paper "A Study of Smoothing Methods for Language Models
Applied to Ad Hoc Information Retrieval", the precision is much more relative with the length of query. If query contains enough information, the model perform well, otherwise, it performs poorly. In addition, paramtrer miu is different among different collections. So I just choose a miu of 2000 which author tried and performed well.

d. java 1.8
